DOC.criteria: patient age 18 65 year , American Society Anesthesiologists Physical Status I II , 5090 kg body weight , undergo elective laparoscopic gynaecological surgery general anaesthesia necessitate intraoperative neuromuscular blockade . expect difficulty endotracheal intubation ( history difficult intubation , reduce open mouth ( < 2cm ) , Mallampati Score 4 ) , increase risk pulmonary aspiration ( gastrooesophageal reflux , full stomach , intestinal obstruction ) , know allergy drug test , pregnancy , neuromuscular disorder , intake drug affect neuromuscular blockade , furosemide , magnesium cephalosporin , hepaticor renal insufficiency .
